Title: Binding from Amplified Poem in Honor of the Prophet Muhammad
Dimensions: Folio H: 10 5/8 x W: 7 1/16 in. (27 x 18 cm)
Description: This brownish red leather Ottoman binding from Walters manuscript W.581 probably dates to the 10th century AH/AD 16th. The central lobed oval medallion has a stamped cloud and floral motif design with a gilt ground.
Keywords: Arabic; Islamic; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Manuscript; Ornament; Iran; Turkey; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Islamic
